repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:2.7 
MAINTAINER "Jared Blouse" 
ENV VERSION 1 
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 
RUN mkdir /code 
WORKDIR /code 
ADD requirements.pip /code/ 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.pip
ADD . /code/ 
ENV DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=pain_manager.settings 

CMD ["/code/start_app.sh"]
